title: Erigon crash - "runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 084acc1af2e853ee4a57dbdd6920b6a1e58ef85c

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
erigon --chain=sepolia --http.port=8545 --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts="*" --http.api=eth,engine,erigon,trace --authrpc.jwtsecret=/data/jwt/jwtsecret --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts="*"
```
Concensus Layer: Prysm 4.0.6

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):
```
beacon-chain-v4.0.6-linux-amd64 --accept-terms-of-use --datadir /data/prysm --sepolia --jwt-secret=/data/jwt/jwtsecret --terminal-total-difficulty-override=17000000000000000 --execution-endpoint=http://eth_erigon:8551 --genesis-state=/data/prysm/genesis.ssz
```
Chain/Network: Sepolia

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon starts

#### Actual behaviour
Erigon crashes right after the start:
```
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.982] logging to file system                   log dir=/data/erigon/logs file prefix=erigon log level=info json=false
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.982] Build info                               git_branch=HEAD git_tag=v2.47.0 git_commit=5536d645942aca88b893a5cb1c9aaf16c8e66ee5
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.983] Starting Erigon on Ethereum mainnet...
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.983] Maximum peer count                       ETH=100 total=100
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.984] starting HTTP APIs                       APIs=eth,erigon,engine
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:52.984] torrent verbosity                        level=WRN
[INFO] [07-06|08:13:55.089] Set global gas cap                       cap=50000000
[EROR] [07-06|08:13:55.089] catch panic                              err="runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" stack="[main.go:33 panic.go:884 panic.go:260 signal_unix.go:835 flags.go:208 node.go:89 main.go:68 make_app.go:42 command.go:274 app.go:332 app.go:309 main.go:38 proc.go:250 asm_amd64.s:1594]"
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
start erigon
I tried on Ubuntu 22.04 and CentOS 7, too → same result.
I tried with Erigon 2.47.0 → same result.
Never mind. I must have built the binary wrong. It works with the one you have in the release.
